term.title: metal to ligand charge transfer (MLCT) transition

item.text: An electronic transition of a metal complex that corresponds to excitation populating an electronic state in which considerable electron transfer from the metal to a ligand has occurred.

item.title: ligand to metal charge transfer transition
ligand to metal charge transfer transition
ligand to metal charge transfer transition
